typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'excel',
	fileSystem: 'inputsource',
	fileName: 'EMP.csv',
	skipLines: 1,
	sheetName: '',
	firstRowAsHeader: true) ~> srcemp
srcemp filter(ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	entity: '',
	format: 'cdm',
	corpusPath: '',
	folderPath: '',
	fileSystem: '',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
